H0.text: Use it and then dispose of it is what a student should do with a beaker that has a chip in the rim.

H1.text: Use it and then return it to where he got it is what the student should do with a beaker that has a chip in the rim.

H2.text: Dispose of the beaker and get a new one is what the student should do with a beaker that has a chip in the rim.

H3.text: Put it back where he found it and get a new one is what the student should do when he finds a beaker with a chip in the rim.

A4.text: Broken and other waste glass should be discarded in a separate container specially marked to indicate its contents.
